document_data.mainbody:
The Vinson family was an influential Amnian mercantile family during the 14 century DR.
In Trailstone, they operated Nastrals Provisioners, the biggest general supply store in the town. They tried to avoid notice beyond this, and it was widely rumored that they had some unpleasant business with the Council of Six.
In the , Lord Kirsoph managed to become a founder of the Council of Six and became Dahaunarch. He attempted to have Pommarch Wulver Xornnag assassinated in the , but he was slain by his own bribed guards in return.
Losing their patriarch in Athkatla, the Vinsons retreated to Trailstone under the leadership of Nastral Vinson and quietly managed their countryside estates and vineyards. They remained relatively powerful and wealthy, but consciously chose to live in obscurity and refused to engage in the high-stakes plots and intrigue of Amn.
* Lord Kirsoph Vinson, a member of the Council.
* Nastral Vinson, the son of Kirsoph.
